Kitchen Door.Desc: Inside you see what looks like a kitchen, and is that food?

South Hall Door.Desc: Looks like a hallway but heading in the south direction

West Hall Door.Desc: Looks like a halway but heading in the weat direction

Courtyard.Desc: looking through you see grass and a big fence

Hard Garbage.Desc: A hard solid mass of dried up Garvage, who knows what this used to be, its got some weight to it

Trash Can.Desc: a dirty old trash can with the smell of old garbage coming out of it.

Big Spoon.Desc: A large Wooden Spoon about a foot and a half long, a little chipped at the ends

Pile of leftovers.Desc: A smelly pile of waste that might possibly have been food lying on a table

Can of Spripesi Cola Up.Desc: A can of Diet Spripesi Cola Up, its the quenchiest! looks edible

Vending Machine.Desc: A banged up old vending machine, looks like its still powered

Zombie.Desc: A Zombie, missing a jaw looks around with only one eye that stares hungrily

ShortDesc: The moldy and messy Cafeteria appears to be unchanged and still dirty.
LongDesc: You walk into a big open room with rectangular dinning tables strewn about.  Old plates of food and broken chairs are thrown around, a smell of mold permeates the air, im glad im not hungry right now
